pullrequest.title: catkinize drcsim with new atlas model (catkin drcsim 3.1.0 candidate)

content.raw:
I was confused by this output during the configure:

~~~
CMake Warning at drcsim_model_resources/CMakeLists.txt:87 (find_package):
  Could not find module Findosrf-common.cmake or a configuration file for
  package osrf-common.

  Adjust CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to find Findosrf-common.cmake or set
  osrf-common_DIR to the directory containing a CMake configuration file for
  osrf-common.  The file will have one of the following names:

    osrf-commonConfig.cmake
    osrf-common-config.cmake



-- osrf-common not found, not building atlas with joint controllers.
CMake Warning at drcsim_model_resources/CMakeLists.txt:97 (find_package):
  Could not find module Findsandia-hand.cmake or a configuration file for
  package sandia-hand.

  Adjust CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to find Findsandia-hand.cmake or set
  sandia-hand_DIR to the directory containing a CMake configuration file for
  sandia-hand.  The file will have one of the following names:

    sandia-handConfig.cmake
    sandia-hand-config.cmake



-- sandia-hand not found, not building atlas with sandia hand
~~~

Looking at the code: [here](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/2593e4a653c459b10dc9a983e39798b982265768/drcsim_model_resources/CMakeLists.txt?at=catkin#cl-86) and [here](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/2593e4a653c459b10dc9a983e39798b982265768/drcsim_model_resources/CMakeLists.txt?at=catkin#cl-96), it seems that those checks don't actually go anywhere (i.e., nobody consults `HAVE_OSRF_COMMON` or `HAVE_SANDIA_HAND`). Can that code be removed?
content.html:
I was confused by this output during the configure:

CMake Warning at drcsim_model_resources/CMakeLists.txt:87 (find_package):
  Could not find module Findosrf-common.cmake or a configuration file for
  package osrf-common.

  Adjust CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to find Findosrf-common.cmake or set
  osrf-common_DIR to the directory containing a CMake configuration file for
  osrf-common.  The file will have one of the following names:

    osrf-commonConfig.cmake
    osrf-common-config.cmake



-- osrf-common not found, not building atlas with joint controllers.
CMake Warning at drcsim_model_resources/CMakeLists.txt:97 (find_package):
  Could not find module Findsandia-hand.cmake or a configuration file for
  package sandia-hand.

  Adjust CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to find Findsandia-hand.cmake or set
  sandia-hand_DIR to the directory containing a CMake configuration file for
  sandia-hand.  The file will have one of the following names:

    sandia-handConfig.cmake
    sandia-hand-config.cmake



-- sandia-hand not found, not building atlas with sandia hand

Looking at the code: here and here, it seems that those checks don't actually go anywhere (i.e., nobody consults HAVE_OSRF_COMMON or HAVE_SANDIA_HAND). Can that code be removed?
